entries.title_d: The Cloak attack wing has started to hyperspace in. A signal has been sent to CorSec command. They will be sending a CorSec attack squad to deal with this menace.
entries.title: Corellia System: Ambush the Cloak Attack Wing
entries.split_quest_alert: Tracking signature of Cloak Leader vessel
entries.quest_location_d: Your assistance will likely be needed in this battle. Do not leave the Corellia system.
entries.quest_helpallies_d: The Cloaks have planned an ambush. Far too many ships have come in than should be necessary to take down a transport. This attack was planned against the CorSec itself. Help CorSec destroy all the Cloak fighters.
entries.quest_findbattle_d: You have been given the most likely jump point for the Cloak attack wing. Remain in this area.
entries.found_loc: Note the navigation waypoint, pilot. This is the expected hyperspace jump point of the Cloak attack wing.
entries.enemies_win: Withdraw, pilot. Our attack wing has been wiped out. Return to the station for debriefing.
entries.enemies_remain: \#pcontrast1 Tactical Computer: <\#pcontrast3  Enemy ship destroyed. %DI enemy ships remaining.\#pcontrast1 >
entries.enemies_arrived: Cloak attack wing has hyperspaced in. Wow, there's a lot of them. Is this right?
entries.battle_started: It's a setup! There are far too many Cloaks here. It was a trick just to lure us here, we are the real target. Destroy them all.
entries.allies_win: Good work, pilot. All Cloak vessels have been... wait. Stand by, we're tracking another signal.
entries.allies_remain: \#pcontrast1 Tactical Computer: <\#pcontrast3  CorSec ship destroyed. %DI allied ships remaining.\#pcontrast1 >
entries.allies_arrived: CorSec attack wing has arrived. Stand by, detecting hyperspace jump.
